Class StableCable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.main.imp.StableCable

    public class StableCable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, DrawCable
    Graphical cable for connecting units on the GUI.
